WorkItem.Description:
If I set the IsReadOnly=true of the DataGrid, and try to bind a column using a Mode=OneWay/OneTime to a property without a public setter I get "A TwoWay or OneWayToSource binding cannot work on the read-only property 'PropertyNameGoesHere' of type 'TypeNameGoesHere'."
 
If I explicitly set the IsReadOnly property of the column to true, then it works as expected.
 
Surely setting the entire grid to IsReadOnly should be enough?

Comments.Message: We agree this is a bug and are tracking it in our internal database to be fixed in a future release.
